attributes.content: Talulah.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: ...Hm? You rarely make that face, friend. What's wrong?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We've decided.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: We're going to stay here.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Ah, uh... putting it another way, there are some of us willing to stay here. And some are thinking about getting out of Ursus territory.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: But either way, none of us'll be carrying on heading south with you. We're sorry.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Alright. I see.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're not even going to ask for a reason?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: You're the one who taught us, took us all this way up 'til today—
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: And does that mean you have to obey me, keep your life tied to your blade, fight Ursus to your last breath?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Because it's never been like that. Never been, friend. You've got the cart and the beast mixed up.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ha ha... I guess. That's like you, Talulah, it really is.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: I'm not your ruler. And you deserve to have this land, in the first place. Even if filled with corpses, turbulent with bad memories, the tundra is, as it was, your homeland.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're all strong. I'm sure you'll find a way to prevail through it all.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If you want, I can send you off.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No, no, don't, really. You should know it wasn't exactly the firmest thing, making this decision, anyhow...
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Ha, thinking about it, I used to be one of your people. I'll be telling my future companions plenty of stories about you.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Here's begging for your mercy, then.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah, the campfire's up!
attributes.name: Distant Shout

attributes.content: Alright, I'll be there in a moment!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Friend, will tonight be our last meal together?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Just wait a bit longer... some others'll want to talk with you too, probably. All of them would.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Talulah.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: How do you guarantee that everyone who stands by your side works with you as one? How do you know betrayal or some other crap isn't headed your way?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Uh... no, I guess you obviously have your ways. You're so smart, so strong to boot, and you know so much. A wound here or some bleeding there wouldn't slow your pace down, would it?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: ...The praise is one thing, but could you not make me out to be so terrifying?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ha ha, don't get us wrong, one or two frustrations wouldn't make us lose our gall. We're no cowards...
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: I just suddenly realized. Actually, maybe not everyone thinks... thinks the same as you, anyway. Yeah.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: I mean, take me. I was gonna die anyway. I just chose to tag along with you all so I'd be able to eat something, live a few more days of my life.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Moment I ate my own fill, I realized there were actually plenty like me. And I figured it'd be nice if they could eat their fill too...
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Strength, particularly in goodwill. They're qualities hard to come by.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Yep. Hard, for sure. So it's definitely not everyone who thinks that way.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Who can guarantee we'll keep moving on, that we won't meet a crueler end? The old noblemen eliminating us all, implicating the innocent poor and all their children along the way?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: I... it doesn't really matter to me, but when I realize all the other ways it could go, it stresses me out.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: And not to mention that to some people, nothing else matters except their own fill... if the question is just feeding yourself, even I could come up with plenty of ideas, like... ngh.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Like selling out.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Selling out what matters to us. Plenty of people are itching to destroy us, and they'd happily let some nobody Infected off to dispatch the remaining rebels. Couldn't be more cost-effective if you tried.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: So I think... seeing that's how things are, we can't leave here now more than ever.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Talulah, we can't take every single person with us, can we?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: I have to... concede that.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: That being the case, before we head all the way south and win all that goodness you talked about... uh, what about the tundra? What about the Infected left behind on it?
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Not just the tundra, really... the world's so vast, and to say it straight, some people are just thinking of taking the chance to leave this place.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Finding like-minded folk elsewhere in hardship and distress, seeing if other places... might have a niche in them for the Infected.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Some people might look at it that way.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Your seeing things this way honestly makes me really... happy.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Uh... feels like the why would fly over my head, so I'm just gonna not ask...
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: C—circling back, uh... does the fact we're leaving at such a critical point mean we'll be considered deserters? I don't really get all that too well, which is why I came to talk to you.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: *chuckle* Well, of course not.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Be it Talulah, the Guerrillas, so on, they're all 'names' and nothing more.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You carry what lies beneath your names... your mindsets, spirits. You carry that sublime fire of resistance, scattering it across this world's every part. For all this, where's the need to fault yourself?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Frankly, I only sort of get it still, but with those words coming from you, Talulah, that puts me at ease.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Be at ease, really.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Alright... I can't let the hunters' efforts go to waste. The knack you all have for laying out traps really opens my eyes.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'll miss the days I was able to eat like this. Talulah, we'll travel to every corner of this land.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Hey, everyone over here! Food's ready!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter
